description: Defines data models for 'Loyalty' and 'LoyaltyHistory' with JSON serialization support, representing user loyalty points and history.

classes.name: Loyalty
classes.description: Model representing user loyalty data including points and history.

classes.name: LoyaltyHistory
classes.description: Model representing individual loyalty point transactions with date, change amount, and reason.

methods.name: Loyalty.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create Loyalty instances from JSON.

methods.name: Loyalty.toJson
methods.description: Converts a Loyalty instance to JSON.

methods.name: LoyaltyHistory.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create LoyaltyHistory instances from JSON.

methods.name: LoyaltyHistory.toJson
methods.description: Converts a LoyaltyHistory instance to JSON.
